root.name: Ruler Helper
root.description: Widget to measure distances over images considering current image scale.
root.author: fab - Fabrice de Chaumont
root.changelog:
- Version 1.2.1.2 Date 2014-04-15 11:25:41
- Version 1.2.1.1 Date 2013-11-05 13:24:12
Fix compatibility with kernel 1.4.0.0
- Version 1.2.1.0 Date 2013-08-06 15:46:25
* corrected issue when launching the plugin in 3D.
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2013-08-02 11:19:14
Now displayed at the current zoom position when added
- Version 1.1.0.3 Date 2013-02-15 13:34:27
* avoid exception on 3D data.
- Version 1.1.0.2 Date 2013-02-14 18:11:44
* issue with classpath because of the share of the plugin.
- Version 1.1.0.1 Date 2013-02-14 17:40:56
* corrected issue with units
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2013-02-14 17:36:05
* added real size after the pixel size
- Version 1.0.0.3 Date 2011-08-18 15:44:19
Added somes features to be compatible with the protractor plugin
- Version 1.0.0.2 Date 2011-08-18 10:45:24
Fix the delete behaviour.
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2011-08-18 10:29:46
Add: Delete ruler by pressing delete on an anchor. Add: Message saying a sequence is needed
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2011-08-17 17:55:18
